g.text: After completing your task, you must now write the corresponding tests.
You only have a few days to write the tests
until the deadline for the tests is reached.
Due to your good programming skills
you still will be ready in time.
with your approach and your tests.
Unfortunately you won't be ready in time,
but you have very extensive tests.
Yaggaya is satisfied with your tests
even though you did not finish in time.
Due to very good programming skills
you have extensive tests despite the short time.
Yaggaya is very satisfied with your work.
and you have not managed to test everything extensively.
Yaggaya is not satisfied with your work,
you have to revise your tests again
and exceed the deadline by a few days.
There is a company party coming up.

path.id: start-to-After completing your task, you must now write the corresponding tests.

g.text: How do you want to proceed?

path.id: #1345811-to-Due to your good programming skills \n you still will be ready in time.

#1345811-to-Unfortunately you won't be ready in time, \n but you have very extensive tests.
Unfortunately you won't be ready in time, \n but you have very extensive tests.-to-path2

g.text: You write tests until the deadline is reached,
what you don't finish by then is simply not tested.

path.id: #1345822-to-Due to very good programming skills \n you have extensive tests despite the short time.
Due to very good programming skills \n you have extensive tests despite the short time.-to-path3
#1345822-to-The deadline has been reached \n and you have not managed to test everything extensively.
The deadline has been reached \n and you have not managed to test everything extensively.-to-path4
nextDecision-to-There is a company party coming up.
